title: NFC Preview
itunes:title: NFC Preview
description:
A room filled with heroes –Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler,Gregg Rosenthal & Nick Shook– recap all the latest news from around the NFL including the Cowboys v Texans game cancellation, the Browns releasing Joe Haden, and Matt Stafford getting paid. The heroes take you around the NFC in 48 minutes to preview the NFC divisions before the season.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
